snippet: The Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons chose hazardous-waste disposal companies based in the United States and Finland.
abstract: Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons selects two hazardous-waste disposal companies to help incinerate chemicals in Syria's weapons arsenal as worries emerge that country is procrastinating on compliance; companies are Veolia Environmental Services Technical Solutions of America and Ekokem OY AB of Finland.
lead_paragraph: The Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons chose hazardous-waste disposal companies based in the United States and Finland.

headline.main: 2 Companies to Destroy Chemicals in Syria’s Arsenal
headline.print_headline: 2 Companies to Destroy Chemicals in Syria’s Arsenal

keywords.value: Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons
